comment: I took PSYC 3000 online and was surprised by how much I enjoyed it. Dr. Wolfe gives clear, thoughtful lectures and truly cares about the subject and her students. She offers plenty of extra credit and grades fairly. It's not an easy A, but you'll leave the class feeling like it was worth it

Honestly, best instructor I have had so far at KSU! I am not a math person, in fact, I struggle quite a lot when it comes to math but Dr. Wolfe made this class so easy and understandable. If you have any questions she takes the time to email you or meet with you! Group projects had great feedback and easy tests! DO NOT TAKE ANYONE ELSE FOR STATS!
rating_tags: Group projects--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Hands down the best professor I have ever taken. She makes the material so easy to understand. I had attempted this class in the past and struggled. It just goes to show how impactful a professor can be if they care about a student success. Do not take anyone else for statistical applications.

Great professor! Assignments are clear and not difficult so long as you actually read. Quiz's don't require lockdown & she provides study guides before exams. There is a group "bookclub", which includes several assignments based on the reading. It's not too difficult, but of course working with groups is hit or miss.

Dr. Wolfe is the best teacher for PSYC3000 in my opinion. She is super helpful, fair, and clear in her class. This class is not easy, and takes work no matter which teacher you have. Wolfe makes it manageable and has really great lectures. Her slides are great if you miss class, and she offers a lot of extra credit.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: This was the best professor! Take the synchronous version, it helps a lot. She gives great feedback on everything. The tests are just like the quizzes. She explains everything clearly and makes it easy to understand. Lots of extra credit. 2 attempts on quizzes. I don't like math, but I loved this class! Easy to get an A if you use her resources!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Wolfe was great. I was very nervous about Stat Applications because I'm not a strong math student, but she helped me feel confident and capable. I loved the way she explained things; it made sense to me. I'm not saying it will be easy, but she will work hard to help you understand. I took the synchronous version and I think that helped too

I was worried about this class at first but she made the class very easy for me to understand. You will be placed in groups but the group assignments were easy but that was because I had a good group. The exams are lockdown browser with webcam and she does watch the videos but if you do the homework and read the PowerPoint you will pass.

Easily has got to be one of the best classes I've ever taken! She gives many resources to make sure we understand the topic. Yes, group assignments but they are easy; I could have done them by myself. GREAT at responding; 2 attempts on quizzes and tests are in 3 parts. Has a review session, just listen to that. HIGHLY recommend even if bad at math!
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Wolfe is easily the best professor I've ever had. She is super responsive to emails and questions when you need her. Since I took the class online, her video lectures were clear and informative with great examples on how to solve problems for the homework/quizzes. If you study the PPT's and watch her helper videos you can get an A in this class

Took her for an online course. The one thing I despise is group assignments! We had a total of 4 and I dislike all of them. The class was hybrid. She made sure you understood before moving to the next topic. I would take her again but if you're like me and dislike group assignments beware.

I can't say enough good things about Dr. Wolfe. I was DREADING Statistics because I am not a math person at all, but she made everything so easy to understand. The group projects were a struggle (only because my partners sucked and I did everything myself), but other than that I have no complaints. TAKE DR. WOLFE FOR PSYCH STATS!

She is willing to help you succeed! She prepares you for everything within the class and after. She makes the material understandable. Weekly homework assignments and a couple of group projects. Tests are lockdown browser with camera, but not too difficult if you study and keep up with the workload. It's hard to fail if you stay committed. Take her

AMAZING professor, definitely recommend. You'd have to try to fail her class. She gives you every resource you'd ever need and is available to help you both during and outside of class time. I won't lie, I didn't use her resources as I should have so I got a B, but you could definitely get an A no problem. She's so helpful and caring. Take her!!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Wolfe is an amazing professor. She really cares for her students and makes sure you understand everything before class is over. She gives you one homework assignment each week and it comes straight from the lectures. You have a few group assignments throughout the semester, but they are not hard. If you have the opportunity to take her, do it.

I took this professor for four weeks and dropped her. This was a few years ago. She had a nasty attitude when I asked for clarification on an assignment. I immediately dropped her class after reading the email. Her class was already complex and then she was rude. I'll never forget that moment. She assumed I would be rude so she jump started it.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Group projects

comment: Love Dr. Wolfe! She replies to emails pretty quickly and wants to make sure that everyone knows what they're doing. There are group assignments but you don't get to pick so be prepared. Provides crash course videos, video lectures, etc. which all help make the content easier. Note that the stats calculations are done by hand instead of calculator.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Dr. Wolfe is one of the best professors I've ever had. She is so helpful and easy to access outside of the course. She reaches out if she sees you struggling and even sets up calls with you to help if necessary. Her lectures are also amazing. This class by nature is difficult but she made it as enjoyable as it can get. I highly recommend.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I took Dr. Wolfe for PSYC 3000 and PSYC 3365. In both classes, attendance was required and counted towards your grade and tests were pretty much the same - each had 2 or 3 parts to each. I managed to get a B in the class - my favorite thing about Dr. Wolfe was that she was very accessible outside of class. I'd definitely recommend her!

Professor Wolfe is one of the best if not the best professors Ive ever had. She makes a difficult statistics easy to understand and is hilarious, relatable and understanding in her lectures. She goes out of her way to check on/help students and wants you to succeed. She posts all the resources you need online in case you miss a class. Take her!

Best professor I have ever had - HANDS DOWN! Attendance is required, but you will be so excited to go to class. She is funny, relatable, and truly cares. If you don't want comprehensive education - then don't take her. Get ready to laugh and feel like you matter!

She is one of the BEST professors in the psychology department. Attendence is very important for your grade, but I honestly looked forward to going to her class everyday because she's such an amazing lecturer. She provides study guides that are practically the same as the exam & an end of the semester group project. 10/10 would take again!

If you take this professor, be prepared to work hard in this course; in my opinion, the course is more complicated than necessary. The test were difficult, and you will have to read lots of material other than the textbook for homework assignments. Good Luck. I would have taken someone else if I could have.

FAV PROFESSOR FOR PSYCH!!! This class was difficult but she made it so easy to understand! Don't think I would've made an A with any other professor for this class. She truly wants to help her students and cares about us. I hope I get the chance to take her again!!! TAKE HER PLEASE
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Amazing lectures

comment: Loved, loved, loved Dr. Wolfe. She was such a sweet and caring professors, you talk about some difficult mental health issues and she handles it with such care. Everything she gives you is relevant to the tests and quizes. Drop the 2 lowest quiz grades, only uses 3/4 assigments, and has EC. There is a group aspect. TAKE HER IF YOU CAN!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: She is AMAZING. You wont regret taking her. Exams are two parts. Both are easy if you pay attention to the lectures and the material she provides.

amazing professor! Shes so sweet and really cares about her students passing. Ive been in school forever and shes literally the best professor ive ever had. There's a lot of reading but she makes the class interesting so its not that bad.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: She's a hilarious professor that's ready to make sure you pass this class. If you have a hard time with stats, she's perfect to take because she's very clear with grading criteria, gives extra credit, understanding, and will make time for you if you have problems! Best to take her out of everyone else I've seen. Also she's super into memes.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Wolfe has to be one of the best professors at KSU! She goes above and beyond for her students, giving amazing study sessions and encouragement. Statistics is challenging but she was able to create a positive learning experience for such a difficult class.

Most of what you learn/are tested on comes from the (3 chapters/week!!) textbook readings, but she ties everything together in class. Swears like a sailor and is probably the most relatable prof I've ever taken. One big group project worth 10% and several smaller ones worth another 10%, know everything on her huge study guide and the test is easy.

Dr. Wolfe has got to be the funniest professor at Kennesaw. 3 tests, no final, open note quiz for each module. Attendance wasn't mandatory, but I still went because she was so funny. There are readings for every module though, take the notes. Thats how I got the A. Most test questions from quizzes. Study guide given, complete it!

One of the hardest and most unfair graders Ive ever had. Also this was an online class yet I had to be on campus multiple times a week to work on weekly labs (a nightmare!) and a huge group project. Its like she doesnt know you have other classes.

I have struggled a lot this semester in her class. Professor Wolfe is good at giving lectures, but she grades very difficultly and is very never consistent with her grading. Experimental might not be a good class to take online. She gives group projects, difficult labs, and difficult tests. Even when I work my hardest its still not good enough.

I'd highly advise you not to take experimental online. Wolfe is very passionate about this course and shows it in her pretty tough grading. There is a semester long group project, which would be fine if it wasn't an online course. Extra credit is offered. Labs aren't too hard. Do NOT make ANY APA mistakes or she will definitely take off points.

Wolfe is very passionate about the subject. The class is very lecture heavy however shes presents this taboo subject in a very fun and approachable way so the lectures are enjoyable. Downfall is this class has a lot of moving parts; weekly reading quizzes, a semester long group project, mandatory movie discussions, and the tests are on lock down
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Group projects

comment: Dr. Wolfe is very unorganized. She is very knowledgeable in the content, but never on time. Feedback is rarely given in a timely manner, making it difficult to succeed on future assignments. Group assignments are required although it is an entirely online course. Extra credit opportunities are given, but that is the only plus to taking her course.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Unless you have already taken this class, excel in statistics, and are fluent in gaming, DO NOT TAKE. Had a 4.0 up until my senior year when I took her. I took advantage of every extra credit and still recieved a 69 in the class. The group projects are BS, dont recieve grades back until the next part of the assignment is due. Gives little feedback.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: Worst professor ever!Very disorganized n grades assignments very late. Her tests are tough and she grades strictly. Gave too much work for summer sem. Found myself working on this class more than other classes. DONT take her if u want to save your grade n GPA. uploaded assignments late n blamed us (for not reporting the missing docs) n technology.

So the class was psyc 2000 online. The other reviews are very accurate. weekly Quizzes (1-4) / wk but they are not that hard, but exams are points heavy and pretty difficult. She is a very slow grader, does not do things when she says she is. You need the book because answers are not in her lectures. Quizzes you are only given 15 minute so read

All-around great, understanding educator with a fun teaching style & intriguing lectures! Its been 4 years since I took Abnormal Psychology with Professor Wolfe, and I am forever grateful to some of the lessons she taught over the duration of that course, like how it shouldnt be labeled abnormal to begin with.

Class was easy and simple. She gives way too many assignments however that she cant even keep up with the Class still doesnt have grades on assignments that were turned in from February ! Also way too much group assignments for an online class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Human Sexuality has been a fantastic class. Super easy assignments, but you do have to read and refer back to the textbook quite a bit. All quizzes and exams are online and open-book though! Dr. Wolfe is really funny and knowledgeable, and I've enjoyed going to class every week. Would highly recommend!

I had her for online. An A was not hard to get in her class at all, but she will stress you out if you are an organized person. She grades EXTREMELY late for everything and makes an excuse every time. She rarely unlock the weekly tasks on time and blames technology for it. She provides more work than she can handle herself, more stressful than hard
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Prof. Wolfe is the absolute best! I took this class as a Hybrid and it was an awesome decision and class! The book is essential for the online quizzes and the study guides that she gives for the tests are very helpful when taking the online tests! Three tests, 12 quizzes, and group work and group project! Overall, easy A! She's super interesting!
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Wolfe is awesome and she is great at explaining things in a way that you actually understand it. Hybrid and attendance is not counted. Tests and quizzes are easy if you use her study guide. group project is annoying & a lot of work throughout the semester, if you don't like group projects do not take her but overall she is an awesome professor!

LOTS of group work for an online class. weekly quizzes, sometimes 2 a week. only have 2 grades and the semester is over next week. 3 tests. can be rude when asking questions. grades tough on group work.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: She takes a while to respond to emails as well as getting grades up. Weve turned in assignments at the beginning of Oct that havent been graded yet and we are about to go on Fall break. Her quizzes are very difficult in my opinion. Test she doesnt give the adequate amount of time especially when she has fill in the blank and matching questions.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--GROUP PROJECTS--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Dr. Wolfe is such an amazing teacher. I have her for hybrid class and during our in class meeting she makes everything so interesting. You do have group projects to do each week along with a new module each week that has a quiz and some readings. The quizzes are super easy if you read the book. Take her!

This was a hybrid class and I felt lost by the next week. Tests were easy because they were online and open book but you have to teach yourself the math because she doesn't go over it in class. Also, write each paper with your best efforts which really saves your grade in the end. I probably would not take again because I need more organization.

Wolfe could teach history of sand and I would take it. Weekly quizzes, lowest two dropped. Three exams, two of which are online. A few group projects with the same group every time. Attendance optional, but it's worth attending. She's super helpful and friendly. Very inclusive.

Dr. Wolfe is wonderful and so passionate. There's a lot of work in the class, but it was hybrid so exams were done online. Several relatively easy assignments.  Only downside was a semester long group assignment that had multiple submission, but even that wasn't the end of the world. I would take her for any class! Easy A if you just do the work.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: TAKE HER! Wolfe is probably my favorite professor I've had at KSU. I had her for 2 hybrid classes. All tests and quizzes were online and open book. She's so funny and makes lectures so entertaining and easy to understand. She's also really helpful if you need to talk to her one on one. There are group projects but they can be done in one meeting.

She is incredibly knowledgeable and is an amazing professor. Research methods is a really dry class, but she did her best on making it entertaining for students to learn. She has very clear at what she's looking for and gives extra credit too. Honestly one of the most passionate and one of my favorite teachers at Kennesaw. Take her if you can!!!!!
Love her!!!!! One of my favorite professors

I love Dr. Wolfe so much so that I am hoping to TA for her. Abnormal psych is an interesting class as it is, and Dr. Wolfe's lectures are as well. There is a semester long group project, but it really is not bad. Tests are online and she provides a study guide that is basically word for word the test. TAKE HER!

I took abnormal psych as a hybrid and she wasn't really caring about the confusion some of us had. The group project and individual assignments are long and many but they are straightforward. She lectures well, very engaging and interesting but if you don't get her film references you miss out on extra credit. :/

I loved her human sexuality course. However if you've been on the internet at all in the past five years there's no "new" material for you to gain in taking the course. Just reinforces things you may have heard of already.  Was not difficult at all. Pretty chill professor.

Took this as a hybrid. Dr. Wolfe is amazing. She handles sensitive subjects with grace and infuses her enthusiasm and passion for what she does in all of her lectures. You'll have to do a few group assignments, but she makes it clear that she's willing to work with members and will help handle it if someone isn't pulling their weight. My new fave.

Good professor who made abnormal psych a good class! Attendance is optional, but I actually enjoyed the lectures. Lots of extra credit opportunities available. There is a group project, but it was super easy. The tests are all online and taken outside of class. Take her!

So Professor Wolfe was basically awesome. She really knows how to navigate through d2l and has online study sessions available. She posts the questions of the test and quizzes before you take it so you can pretty much find all the answers before. She really cares. she is allowing the entire class extra credit because too many f's were made.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Dr. Wolfe is an amazing professor. She gives exceptional study guides, if you do those you'll absolutely make an A. Solid grader and super easy to talk to and get's back to you quickly. I would highly recommend her for any psych classes you need to take.

I took Abnormal Psych as a hybrid. She gave us a group project which didn't make sense with the class being hybrid. It didn't add much to the class and was very inconvenient. Get the book!! Weekly quizzes that you'll ace ONLY if you do the assigned reading. Every test/quiz online. Super easy if you prepare beforehand. Would take her again.

A very kind and knowledgable professor. Her lectures are interactive and entertaining. She is very clear about what she expects from our work and is not difficult. Weekly reading quizzes and unit tests are all online out of class. Simple group work throughout semester. Extra credit options. One small presentation and short response paper.

A very good teacher.  I took Hybrid course.  She was well organized.  Good Lectures.  I would have like to have the quizzes after the lecture but I see why she did them in advance (so you would read).  Gives study guides for quizzes.  Do those and you will do fine in this class.  Watch for weekly quizzes and group projects.

If you don't like group projects, don't take this class; you have 4 of them (same group). A few tests (2 parts and easy enough if you study). Weekly quizzes. That's pretty much your grade. Do the extra credit, study, and pray for a good group.

STAY AWAY!!!! I've taken so many online classes and this was by far the hardest!!! Her set up on d2l was horrible, & her test were NOT multiple choice & they were terribly hard and nothing was in the book. I had the book online! And I still couldn't find answers to her questions. Never take this professor. I repeat. I have a 4.0 and its ruined.

I would NOT recommend taking this class online.  weekly quizzes, sometimes two, group project, and other side assignments. If you decide to take this class online, do not bombard yourself with other classes; this class alone requires a lot of work.

This was the first of two classes I took with Professor Wolfe, and I would take more if I could.  She is one of the few profs in the Psych department that actually incorporates current attitudes and research into Psych and delves into why you should care about the material.  Her lectures are always engaging and timely.

Dr. Wolfe is a good professor, and knows her stuff. BUT! She takes weeks and weeks to grade anything, so not only do you not know where you stand grade-wise, but you also don't know how to proceed, and if you're doing the right thing. She expects you to grasp everything she's saying and doesn't teach the techniques needed to complete the labs.

Dr. Wolfe is by far the best professor I have ever had. I would highly recommend taking any course with her that you can. I have taken several courses with her, and earned an A in all of them. She does like group projects, and demands a lot in papers, but she is so helpful and fun, I absolutely love her classes!

She is very strict on the research proposal, however there's a lot of other ways to gain points if writing is your weak area. Do the study guide before exams, do extra credit, and submit everything and you'll be fine! She is willing to help and explain things that are unclear. Would definitely take again!
Love her. She is awesome. Hard class, must know your stuff.

She is so hard on APA. Don't expect to get an A on any of her assignments. If you are not a good writer don't take her class. I would never ever take a class with her because she takes forever to grade papers and it takes her about a week or so to respond to your emails. If you wanna good grade ( A or B ) don't take her.

Wolfe is a great teacher! Very upfront with you. There are 8 labs, 3 test, indiviual and group paper, and soo much extra credit that you really cant fail the class unless you dont put in the WORK! I would def take her!

Professor Wolfe is awesome!! She's VERY entertaining! This is not an easy class but if you put forth some effort then you can do well! She makes this class very interesting and I would definitely recommend her to anyone.

She's funny and passionate about material. Quiz & assignment every week, hours of work. Case study paper(s), 2 exams, group projects. She grades very slowly. Grades primarily on APA format and not content; not fair grader. I spend hours working on a research paper, and didn't do well because of APA. She's not very understanding unlike she claims.

Professor Wolfe is awesome!  She makes this class a lot of fun, is very helpful, and very funny.  She gives a lot of homework but as long as you do the work and put in effort then you'll be fine.  Take her!

You need to come to class but it is not required. Dr. Wolfe became my favorite professor after this class. She is entertaining and passionate. She gives study guides that make tests super easy. Weekly reading, quizzes, and assignments in every one of her classes.

Professor Wolfe has a great personality. Her lectures are interesting, but she gives attendance points for coming to class. There is a lot of busy work in this course. The exams will be easy if you complete the study guide. Wolfe is not organized at all! Towards the end of the semester do not expect grades within 3 weeks, if at all.

Easy class. The study guides she gives are the exact same things as the test. There are small weekly assignments that are easy to complete. Only bad thing about her was that it took her well over a month to grade our interview papers.

Best hybrid Dev. Psyc teacher on campus! You have 3 exams, with study guides that tell you exactly what you need to know. There's also weekly readings, quizzes, and small online assignments such as watching a video and answering questions. There also one group presentation, very simple, and one interview paper. Take her!
Took her hybrid and loved it! She is very organized and gives you every opportunity to do well. And her lectures are interesting--you'll almost never be bored in class!
Hybrid class, was my first and she made it great! Didn't want to miss a class bc she is hilarious. Very straightforward and no surprises. LOVED her! Def recommend!

Do not take this woman if you have not perfected your APA style. She literally goes through the papers with a fine tooth comb and a magnifying glass looking for the slightest errors. It takes her forever to return the graded papers and majority got C's and D's. Easy online weekly quizes, but 3 lengthy in-class exams with some short essay questions.
Took her for experimental and I loved her. She made the class so easy when in reality it is a scary class. She is very clear and easy to like.. she's funny too. I would def take her again.

I took Dr. Wolfe as a hybrid class. She is very laid back so if you like a clear, clean cut class schedule, you are in for a surprise. She moves things around which is nice because she is flexible but sometime it is hard to expect what is expected. She is eager to help and very funny!
LOVED HER!!!! Easy and enjoyable. Best teacher I've had by far. TAKE HER

Dr. Wolfe is by far the best professor! I've taken her twice (and am planning to take again during Fall). She is hilarious! Goes out her way to help you! Class is EASY (but graphic, be ready). An EASY A is guaranteed, AND you will learn a lot! TAKE HER!She's absolutely awesome! Extremely intelligent, funny, and compassionate! She wants you succeed

Prof. Wolfe is by far one of my favorite teachers I have had. She is hilarious, quirky, and makes everything completely interesting, & you can tell she loves her work. Class is very tolerable, workload is reasonable, and she works with you with grades. Highly recommend!

Dr. Wolfe is an amazing teacher! She is willing to work with all students and their conflicting schedules. Her class consists of 6-7 quizzes, 4 tests, and 2 writing assignments. Attendance is not mandatory to do well on the tests, but she does in class activities that count for participation. She is hilarious and makes the class interesting!

A wonderful professors. All you have to do is read her power points. Study guide is sooo good. A got a very easy A. She gives tons and tons of extra credit both on the exams and in class. Attend class because she gives class activities that add up. She knows her stuff. Totally loved her!
